text:
Hmm, I see, now that you mention it,
it does have that vibe.

It feels like an idol costume too.
Even if you say it's like a cheerleader, I get it!
I'm looking forward to performing in this!
Meguru, are you okay with showing your stomach?
Oh, because your stomach might get cold!?

No, it's not really about that... Yeah, but it's true
that it would be troublesome if my stomach got cold.

Okay then, to make sure your stomach doesn't get cold,
let's make sure to wear something on top!
